actions.name: Actions
actions.description:
Dominator [2 Actions as below (d6 to determine)]:
1 Anti-Life Drain [Cast, Remote | Endure]: 10 (3d6) and this Being is healed equal to the damage
2 Disintegrate [Cast, Remote | Endure] (Recharge Cd4): 21 (6d6) and disintegrated if killed this way
3 Raise [Cast, a corpse in Far]: Raised as a Zombie under this Being's control
4 Death Touch [Cast, Remote | Endure]: 5 (d10) and Paralyzed (Cd6)
5 Fear [Cast, Aura Far | Will]: Frightened (Cd4)
6 Life Disruption [Cast, Aura Near | Endure]: 10 (3d6, half on pass) and +1 Fatigue

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description:
Fear Aura [Aura Near | Will]: Frightened until they pass this Check on a subsequent Turn, or Cd6 after.
Indomitable: It can't be transformed.
Grim Harvester: Whenever a Being dies within Far, this Being regains HP equal to that Being's HD or Level.
Magic Ward V: Cast Checks that include it as a Target have a d12 penalty.
Soul Jar: It can't die if it has a Soul Jar intact.
